website_summaries.verdict: A versatile piece of furniture that works equally well as a dresser or for linen storage.
pros: Tall and narrow dimensions along with casual styling make this a versatile furniture piece that fits almost anywhere
cons: Some owners feel the gaps between the top of the drawers are too wide and easy to see into

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy, decorative
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our bathroom and it definitely exceeded my expectations. It is sturdy, decorative, and only took about 10 minutes to put together. It has A LOT of room for storage!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lamana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment that is handicap accessible. There is one drawer in my entire kitchen so this unit came in handy. It was so easy to build and yet so beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: I now can easily find the tools i need
customer_reviews.text: Though ihe five drawer unit didn't allow me to push my kitchen walls to enlarge it, it certainly decluttered it. I now can easily find the tools i need, the dishcloths, aprons, oven mitts etc that had the miserable habit of hiding rom me at the least opportune moment. So it could match the decor, I simply spray-painted it cream, inside and out. It was easy to assemble, is not obtrusive and holds more than I expected, because I had not realized how much deeper that bottom two drawers were.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Constable

customer_reviews.title: Very nice functional accent piece!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and looks nice for storing household items. These are wicker baskets which are reinforced with metal rods. Beware other like pieces that claim wicker baskets which are plastic. I always read reviews first, which is what led me to this one. I am happy with this and may order another one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wow...got the unit ONE day after I ordered it. Was very easy to put together. I love the look, but it seems a bit unsturdy (and that's probably why they give you bolts and fasteners to attach to the wall...I really don't want to do that since I may move it to a different spot). I'm a little worried about the warning label on the product too (about possible chemical exposure including Lead - I've been Lead poisoned in the past - not sure I would've purchased had I known this).
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Bell

customer_reviews.title: Do You Need Storage in a Tight Space.?
customer_reviews.text: This five drawer unit can be a very good answer, if your pressed for room. The drawers have a very useful capacity, slide in and out freely and operate as nicely as a conventional bureau drawer. The color is neutral and will work fairly well with any color scheme. Assembly is quick and the unit is light enough in weight to be moved easily, by one person. I have mine tucked in a corner of my Studio Apartment bathroom and it is more than adequate for some linens and bathroom items but still leaves ample room to move around the bath. An attractive purchase price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles  Coombs

customer_reviews.title: 5-drawer storage unit...wicker baskets
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in less than 15 minutes. We did not anchor it to the wall, just put it together. We use in at the front entry to store our dog walking supplies - leashes, harnesses, small towels, cold weather jackets...It is perfect for that and looks good - not obtrusive at all. I would not recommend trying to store heavy objects in these baskets unless this unit is anchored to the wall, otherwise, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BandD

customer_reviews.title: Looks Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to buy "furniture" on Amazon. But this thing is fantastic. It was relatively easy to put together. The instructions were clear everything was labeled. I use it for clothes so you can see them a bit because of the way the baskets sit, but I think it is ideal for pretty much anything. It does come in a ginormous box and is a bit heavy so just be careful when you bring it in the house.
customer_reviews.author: RavenWriter

customer_reviews.title: Love this wicker set of drawers
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday and couldn't wait to put it together. It was exactly what I was hoping for and exactly as advertised in the picture. I put it in my bathroom for towels, washclothes, rolls of toilet tissue and miscellaneous other stuff. Looks great! The top shelf is wood--I read some reviews where they call the color 'orange'--the color actually compliments the drawers perfectly and has a very pretty wood stain. I may buy another one for my kitchen. I already had two of the 6-drawer wicker drawer units and loved them, which is why I bought this taller one that I needed for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Feels horrible
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to get this in so that I could organize my office supplies. It wasn't too hard to assemble but the little sheetrock screws and braces should have given me a heads up ... it is so wobbly and unstable and that's without anything in it. But the worst part if the funky smell and worse texture of the wicker baskets. It feels to me like items that have been left out in the garage ... a film of dirt with some material deterioration. Oh and the warning label for lead doesn't make me feel too safe either. Walk away from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This item was so easy to assemble even a 5 year old could put it together! This product fits perfectly next to my fireplace and sliding glass door. I bought this because my daughter would leave the dog leashes, their sweaters, etc, all over; I got tired of reminding her to put them away. So I found this 5 drawer storage unit and "wala" no more stuff left in the living room! The bottom baskets are very deep!!! I love that! And the other 3 drawers are adequate too! The baskets appear very sturdy. You won't go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: ceily

customer_reviews.title: This works for me
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this. Its just right for me, it fits my space and it allows me to sort my summer clothes in one place instead of having everything mixed up with my winter clothes. I was worried that the rattan would snag but nope doesn't even. So this was a good purchase. Thanks Amazon keep it coming. :)
customer_reviews.author: Zen dancer

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for tight spaces.
customer_reviews.text: My new apartment is limited on space, so I bought this unit because it was narrow and wouldn't take up too much room but thought the drawers would provide ample capacity. Pretty easy to assemble and I found it more sturdy than reported by others. It does the job I had in mind, but I think it's actually a little too narrow. The footprint could be a little wider, making it easier to store things like towels, without it being to big.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Fields

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase and good value for the money. Shipped in perfect shape with all parts in tact. Easy assembly even for a single senior woman. Lovely enhancement for the bedroom. Top is very nice. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 more this year and they matched up perfect to the old one
customer_reviews.text: I had one for about 2 years. Has held up perfect. Bought 2 more this year and they matched up perfect to the old one. For the price they're great. When I changed out my counter tops I had them make tops for these and now they look even better. The 2 new ones I tied together with zip ties and with the one piece granite top it looks like one unit. I thought about buying one more just for spare parts but the original one held up so well, I'm not sure I have to do that. They're kinda wobbly but, hay, it's not solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: DianeLin

customer_reviews.title: Great Light weight pretty storage shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to hold all of my sewing paraphernalia. I'll admit it.. I like pretty things, even if it's just for storage. This fits the bill perfectly. It sits next to my regular table that has the sewing machine (so not a special piece of furniture) and pretty-ups that corner of the room. The fact that there are no stoppers to keep the drawers from being pulled all the way out, is a PLUS! The drawers are light and I can dig for what I need on my lap. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you plan on storing....
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, but you need two people. Placing the metal parts that hold the drawers can be frustrating as they aren’t screwed in so as you go to put each level in, the previous one may fall out. As far as storage, the drawers are smaller than I thought. They are short so you’re limited in what you can put it. Not sturdy at all. You definitely can not safely put anything heavy in anything other than the bottom two drawers and you can’t really put too much on the top shelf. Metal came bent, drawers still fit, but it wasn’t in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Freda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer clothes
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little unit for my summer clothes. Our closet spaces are small so this helps save space and holds all my T-shirts, bathing suits and some tank tops. I have a lot of tops :). My hat sits on top too. I think it was a little pricey but compared to other units we looked at ~ it works fine for our needs and fits perfectly next to my dresser.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble and attractive!
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these in my bedroom, but when I bought some new clothes I found I needed more storage space so I got another. I really love thes! They’re easy to assemble, and the first one I got is still in great shape after years of constant use. If you need extra storage space in any room of your house I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Cincijayne

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PURCHASE ITEM FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard to put together, did it myself. This has been an awesome buy. I use it in my bathroom to keep my pj's in and other clothing items as I use the bathroom as a changing room to keep from disturbing my husband's sleep. Top drawer is used for make up and I have a mirror sitting on the top. Works perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Night Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good value and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother who is entering Assisted Living, and needed something in the bathroom to hold bathroom stuff -- there was no other storage. First the good: it was very easy to assemble. Have had nightmare assembly issues with pieces like this in the past. But the instructions are good, and the parts are labeled, so done in 30 minutes. As others have noted, this is not fine furniture (note the price), and yes, the wicker is a little rough in a couple of places. Nonetheless, for the price, I view it as a good value. It stores a lot of stuff. It does help to have two people around for the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan in DC

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use for storage in my bathroom & it definitely enhances decor. Frame is simple to assemble. It is overall sturdy enough and definitely functional. Drawers are sturdy and hold a lot, but weave can catch on frame occasionally if yanked out roughly. I don't regret the purchase & have received compliments from friends.
customer_reviews.author: sharonnj

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for the price. not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: pretty flimsy for $125. Thought it would be much more sturdy for the price. Looks nice. Dont put too much weight into wicker drawers, they have wicker bottoms as well I am disappointed for the price but will keep because it is the exact we needed for a certain space.
customer_reviews.author: RIck Vander Weide

customer_reviews.title: Loads of extra storage!
customer_reviews.text: I easily assembled this item in about 20 minutes and didn't even break a nail. Hardly takes up any space but it provides a lot of storage! I originally purchased for my bedroom but I ended up putting it in the corner of my dining room. It looks great! In fact I could move it around the house because it would look good in any room. I'm seriously thinking about buying another. Very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny918

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. This is the easiest unit to assemble that I have ever tried to put together. It was simply amazing! I purchased 3 units and need another as I misjudged the amount of storage I needed, but I will be purchasing another, to finish getting my clothes out of boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jones

customer_reviews.title: This purchase was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. The “5 Drawer Storage with Wicker Baskets...” is really nice as well as sturdy. The dresser might look a little messy in the picture I posted due to sheets, towels etc., but it looks better in person. This purchase was exactly what I was looking for, especially since the room it is placed in, is rather small, and this dresser fits very nicely in it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed in this myself.
customer_reviews.text: The wicker is broken in places and looks rough. It's more flimsy than I imagined it would be and when you open the shelves, you have to hold them because they aren't really drawers...but baskets not connected to the rails. The bottom is defective on mine and the bottom basket keeps falling out. I was going to return it but I'm disabled and its just too big of a hassle to do. I wish I could call the company though and tell them about the bottom part. Maybe they could send me a new frame that works. But I misplaced the papers that came with it...although I'll keep trying...
customer_reviews.author: Jeannieiam

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in my doctors office and searched online and found it here on amazon. My husband put it together in less than 15 minutes and it is so pretty. It is not meant for heavy duty storage, but is perfect for what I needed it for. There are tracks for the drawers, but you have to make sure the drawer is straight and you cannot balance the drawer in the opening like you can a traditional dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Danyl K Peterson

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of wicker and this item is so wonderlful. It looks great and offers plenty of storage. Almost too easy to assemble. I am more than very pleased with this item I definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition to Our Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, clear instructions, nice capacity for stuff that wouldn’t fit in the under-sink cabinets. Love the deeper drawers, which are large enough for somewhat taller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Rhian Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: A good deal for the money. It's perfect for organizing small things; I use it for jewelry, but it could be used for many other purposes.. It's not hard to put together, the directions are easy to follow, few tools are needed, and it looks nice. The basket drawers pull out and go back in easily. This is not high quality furniture, but that's not what you expect for this price. However, it still looks nice and not "junky".
customer_reviews.author: Swing Dancer

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: Storage is such an issue for me since I downsized from a 9 room house to a 4 room apartment. I bought one of these and liked it so much I bought another!! I don't know what reviewers were saying about putting the drawers together. Mine were simple and had no screws. I'm an older lady (nearing 60) and put it together in under 15 minutes with just the included wrench and a screwdriver for the 4 screws that are to attach the wooden top to the frame, that's all! The wicker drawers are much darker than the photo shows, a beautiful dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Not As Expected.
customer_reviews.text: Although easy enough to assemble, this storage unit is cheaply made. The wicker drawers are flimsy and not attractive. I built it and kept it because returning it would be a challenge. It came in a very large box which had several tears and would not have been easy to put back together. This unit is over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Y Darrroch

customer_reviews.title: Once assemble,this cabinet is heavy!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a storage cabinet, this is it! I placed mines in our hallway to catch all the cat and dog toys. Great buy, good price
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This looks exactly as lovely as it is depicted on Amazon, easy to put together, and a wonderful extra and decorative item in the den, or anywhere you want to put it. the drawers are amazingly roomy too! Wonderful item!
customer_reviews.author: readingisfun

customer_reviews.title: functional kitchen storage
customer_reviews.text: I like how this looks in my kitchen; provides quite a bit of storage, yet small enough that it doesn't take up a lot of space. I am using it to store water bottles & sodas which I previously just had stacked on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: thowland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 5-drawer storage unit, easy assembly, Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful 5-drawer storage unit, easy assembly, Love it. So handy for misc. Great to consolidate all the small stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: It looks good, was easy to build, but may need some TLC/Welding to ensure it doesn't come apart in the future.
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased these for organizing her quilting supplies. Construction was pretty easy. It looks just like the picture... However... The shelves fit and should stay in place... But I don't like how loose they sit. I'll eventually weld the frame permanently together to ensure that nothing pops apart.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Struthers

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I intended
customer_reviews.text: Like this storage unit. Doesn't take up much space, looks good. Drawers are funky sometimes when you pull them too far out but all wicker furniture seems to do this so not the fault of the item. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ladyjean

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I hate these kinds of reviews because the unit is lovely - I would NEVER have spent $127 on a single one. What I put in my cart said that it was a 2-Pack. $64 for one is a nice price for a nice piece of furniture. It is not a high-quality enough piece to be worth $127. If you're paying between $60-70 this is a sturdy unit that looks very nice and has *great* assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is it is not very sturdy. I have tightened the screws as tightly as they can go, but it is still wobbly. The top piece is an orange color, which is not a complaint, just a comment. There is a lot of space between the top and the basket, so you can see inside, which I don't like. I purchased this for hidden storage and it just looks sloppy. I ended up putting it in my laundry area. It was fairly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. DiNarda

customer_reviews.title: Super easy assembly, nice product.
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box I said oh freek, have to assemble. But literally not your typical assembly. A few super easy screws and everything else logically slipped into place. About 15 minutes and Im not particularly handy. Anyway, once put together really nice storage. Small footprint, lots of storage and looks really pretty. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anne N.

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but is dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a stand next to a coffee bar in my kitchen and for the little bit of use it will get, it is perfect. I do not see that this item would be useful for a lot of use as the wicker is very dry and brittle and breaks easily. Either that or do like I am going to and seal the baskets to make sure they last.
customer_reviews.author: JennG

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet once modified
customer_reviews.text: Used in bathroom for storage. Liked the look and suits my needs. The downfall is that it has no stops for drawers. We had to tie the back of the drawers to the back rails of the frame to keep them from pulling out completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well constructed storage unit
customer_reviews.text: nice to look at, sturdy and lots of storage space in the drawers. Perfect to keep TP in and fits nicely in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Convient for Frequent  Storage Acess
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to assemble. It provides convenient and handy storage of records and papers next to my office desk while using very little floor space!
customer_reviews.author: Timberwolfe

customer_reviews.title: I'm being nice wit 2 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Typical low cost item normally found in "point" catalogs. Couple issues with quality (sprung welds (or glued spots / can't really be sure), one missing item but got it together and it's useful for what my wife wanted. I'd pass on this one if I had it to do over.
customer_reviews.author: skyshot

customer_reviews.title: Unique and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice storage unit and very different from any other one out there. Was able to purchase on a real good deal off amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This unit is cheap. I guess you get what you pay for, but the "drawers" become crooked and the whole thing is wobbely. We use it to put face masks in, dog "duty" bags, dog brushes and combs, and leashes. It's just something to keep near the front door that contains anything we need as we head out. I don't really recommend it, not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl gerfin

customer_reviews.title: I use it for my piano/cello music.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, went together as easy as pie! Very handsome. Exactly what I wanted, delivered straight to my door! Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: It you are looking for a sturdy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this one star and it was just for the looks, because it did look exactly as pictured but the quality is definitely not there. It is very wobbly and the drawers are not lined with felt so if you put something knitted in the drawer it pulls unless you are very careful taking it out. I decided to use it for my little granddaughter's socks, pajamas, tshirts, etc. It you are looking for a sturdy piece of furniture, look elsewhere! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Clement

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the value and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wicker stand for my small apartment after reviewing about 20 other products ranging from 3 drawer wide to 5 drawer tall and prices from $60 to $150. I was very happy with my selection. The wicker stand is very sturdy, looks great with my rustic bed set. Also it was easy to put together with only one screw driver needed for 4 the top plate. i put the whole thing together in maybe 15 mins. Also the baskets are well made and are great for alternative dresser.
customer_reviews.author: JP Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT BUY !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: you will probably never see this post...but here goes...this is by far the most cheap, piece of manufactured junk ever and for 128.95... i got two words RIPPED OFF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket stand. It is exactly what I wanted to remove all the fruits and various items from my counters. Neatly organized now in this stand. I would advise putting the heavier items at the bottom, it may become a bit top heavy. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: lynette martinez

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble and it looks real nice in my bedroom for overflow items. It's sturdy but light, could easily be pushed over by kids or a rambunctious dog. I like it very much and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced item
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to put together and nicely sized drawers. But the drawers on my piece are badly woven and not sized to fill the area so you can see the content of the drawers from the front. It makes it looks messy. I feel this piece of furniture is seriously overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Treeland

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but not so sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It is flimsy and already the shelving disconnected from frame. I love the look, perfect for my needs. Just not the most sturdy and baskets are not the best quality as I have had these before by another maker. Overall looks great, hope my husband can keep hooking together for me.
customer_reviews.author: Janet E Ansel

customer_reviews.title: good product, met expectations
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my wife to replace a smaller unit,,,she loves it and it fits well in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: billrock

customer_reviews.title: it was really easy to put together once i got it unboxed
customer_reviews.text: its cheap but you get what you pay for. it was really easy to put together once i got it unboxed. the baskets aren't in great shape. they aren't very smooth and i had a hard time getting the bottoms in place. it looks good once it was all together but I doubt it will survive a move - its not very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice. Keeps my 1 yr old away from grabbing everything
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Just fair
customer_reviews.text: This is a fair product. Easy to assemble but it's not the sturdiest piece of furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B Ford

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with item
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in a small space of a bedroom instead of high boy dresser. Matches night stand color with black iron handles. Placed small lamp on top and small mirror above top. Very happy with item.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: A little wobbly and drawers are not steady. Overall it looks great where I needed it and I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: JoniB

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The baskets pull out so if you use them to store pens or whatever you can just take it out and set it on a table
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing..
customer_reviews.text: This item had so much potential, but the frame was missing a hinge, making it impossible to assemble. I would have exchanged, but the hassle of returning the item, putting it back in the torn box and driving to UPS myself, made me decide to only refund. Disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: KimEAz

customer_reviews.title: The Baskets STINK !!
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this a five as it was so easy to put together and it was just what I wanted, but......when I unwrapped the storage baskets they smelled horrible. I decided to give them a few days to air out and put dryer sheets and candle scents in them but that didn't work. Today I took them outside and sprayed them with the hose and am leaving them out for a couple of days. If that doesn't work i'll probably rub some rotten meat on them to improve the smell!
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Easy to assemble. I have all three in the collection
customer_reviews.author: M. Tousignant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture and very functional
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to store all our odd and ends in when we remodeled and needed to get rid of our small desk. This has been great. We stored everything from our desk in it and many other things too. It is really pretty and very functional. We got a lot of little plastic baskets to organize our things within the drawers. You do have to hold on the baskets, especially the large ones, when you pull them out. Just get what you want and push them back in.
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Sherri from PA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Was apprehensive buying on line without seeing first. Quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: JRock

customer_reviews.title: It's okay - did not fit in the place where ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay - did not fit in the place where it was placed. We moved it to a different room and are using it there - it is too tall for the original use.
customer_reviews.author: Little Tarez

customer_reviews.title: Put this in a kitchen corner and it works great! Completely cleaned out a kitchen cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Needed some storage for all of my daughter's art supplies, stickers, etc. Put this in a kitchen corner and it works great! Completely cleaned out a kitchen cabinet! Very sturdy and holds so much stuff! Looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kps

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Do use the bolt to attach to wall or it could tip over. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Regina K Short

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and put it together right away. It wasn't that hard to put together. The instructions were easy. It isn't sturdy as if I bought an item from Pier 1 but it is sturdy enough. For the price, I am very happy with unit.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality and moderately easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I am one of those people that buy things already put together because I'm bad at it and bad at directions. Well, this came with good directions and with a friend, I was able to put it together and it didn't take that long. I recommend it especially because for the price it is so well built and looks so much more expensive that it was. Grab it while you can because this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wysocki

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much I bought the bigger one to match it. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: BMB

customer_reviews.title: Storage works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for storage but recommend to attach to wall!! It wobbles when opening or closing the sliding baskets
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Manges

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of snacks.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for holding snacks for the kids. It looks good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefrog

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and it’s functional!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. I needed extra storage for my small and large scarves, and it accommodates them perfectly. I couldn’t quite figure out how to put it together, but I’m thankful for being married to a husband who could!
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Louis

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: This can be used anywhere in the house. In my case it’s being used for kitchen items.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. in CA

customer_reviews.title: The color is good (not so orangey) great for lingerie
customer_reviews.text: light weight, drawers can be taken out as baskets. The color is good (not so orangey) great for lingerie. Shipped quickly and in good shape. IT has limits but is perfect for limited space. Drawer/Baskets are two pieces and have good drawer sides. I prefer the design of this one compared to shorter ones we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Butch & wife

customer_reviews.title: This unit is not hard to put together. 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not hard to put together. 30 minutes tops and this includes looking for the screws the cat stole. The quality of the wicker is rough. I bought it for a specific purpose and it is filling that purpose. I did not realize that the drawers are open on top so will have to watch and see if dust is a problem. For the price, space it consumes and usability, it is a bargain. No regrets here.
customer_reviews.author: Dorinda Linder

customer_reviews.title: it could have been designed better. The drawers do not slide on the tracks ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it could have been designed better. The drawers do not slide on the tracks smoothly and the wicker was marked up and scratched!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my lovey wife's mother day gift
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. When it made it here she ask if she could put it together and of course I said yes. She is very smart and strong but I have to tell you I was talking to a friend on the phone and 10 minutes later she was done. It is a very nice looking and sturdy with lot's of storage space. If your wife girl friend like wicker you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best solution to my problem of keeping a lot of paper work out of sight
customer_reviews.text: It is standing right next to it's buddy that I ordered at the same time. Perfect solution for all the stuff I just can't throw away. Out of sight and everything looks neat in the den.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Spencer

customer_reviews.title: wobbly and stinky
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but wobbly. And the baskets stink!!!! Anyone know how to get rid of the basket smell?????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great look.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this before, good value. Fair on sturdyness. I use this for under garments, bathing suits socks. It works just great.
customer_reviews.author: ellens414

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Adds a nice touch to my bathroom and holds a bunch
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good item for short term, occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: It's good for what it is: an extra set of drawers. I wouldn't make this my main drawer though; they don't slide out as smoothly as one would like. The basket drawers themselves seem to be pretty sturdy so I don't expect them to fall apart too soon. The drawers can still slip out of the frame if you're not careful. We put them in a vacation house and it's great for that occasional use. Overall not a bad item.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Mirque

customer_reviews.title: Tall stylish storage
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this item. Works perfectly in my dining room. Great storage with the drawers for items needed daily. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Arlie Hixson

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this unit
customer_reviews.text: Loved the storage unit. True to picture. Only prob was wrong parts. Called the manufacturer and they were right on it and very helpful, it was just time consuming waiting to receive correct parts. I would recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery miller

customer_reviews.title: makes my daughter's apartment room look brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Helps add storage in a cute way. It's tall, so it doubles as a bedside table for her raised bed!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not smooth sliding
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product and my initial intention was to use it for my toiletries which I access on a daily basis, but the drawers are not smooth sliding and if its not a full drawer, all my bottles and toiletries wobble and fall. Now I need to find something else to use it for :(
customer_reviews.author: em2s

customer_reviews.title: Ok in assembling, poor wicker quality
customer_reviews.text: This comes in 29 pieces with almost all labeled, making it easy to put together. I bought several wicker pieces from Hobby Lobby on sale, thus cheaper than this piece. They are all better wicker quality with the threads evenly spaced, no exposed ends and has unified coloring. Plus, they are little to no assemble. Though you don't always have the selection at Hobby Lobby since the furniture is not available June-Dec. to make way for x-mas items. I am keeping this unit, since I already assembled it and it is going in a less prominent area of the house.
customer_reviews.author: SusanaB net

customer_reviews.title: Very nice baker rack
customer_reviews.text: Very nice baker rack, and it fix perfect in the area I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and lots great in my laundry room
customer_reviews.author: Splen

customer_reviews.title: this is amazing, and so happy that I bought this
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this is amazing, and so happy that I bought this. Perfect fit for inside my little bathroom. Storage in this is amazingly wonderful and abundant! Well made! highly recommend if you have a small spot that you want to optimize storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous again

customer_reviews.title: I paid more for this and expected a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Was obviously repacked and had many scratches to the metal. It stands crooked. Inferior quality.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: I got two of these and love the look
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these and love the look. One is very sturdy but the other wobbles slightly hence the 4 stars...maybe it is my floor? I haven't had any issues with other furniture though in the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: W. Welling

customer_reviews.title: I happily did not expect too much
customer_reviews.text: This was inexpensive, and looks it. I happily did not expect too much, so was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrslhs

customer_reviews.title: Almost Exactly
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good purchase. I appreciate the ease in which it was assembled, but the drawers are a little "unguided" in their spaces. Tend to wiggle back and forth when you pull out or push in. One of my drawers was missing a part...I called and received another drawer within two days. I was shocked!!! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Sharron P.

product_meta.title: 5 Drawer Storage Unit w/ Wicker Baskets - Versatile Tower - Wrought Iron Frame
product_meta.description: A perfect balance between function and design, this beautiful 5-drawer wicker storage unit accents any traditional décor. The black frame and oak top are enhanced by the abundant wicker baskets. On the bottom, two larger baskets provide storage for larger items like bed sheets, toilet paper or dishes while the three smaller drawers above are perfect for magazines, silverware and spices. This soft country style unit also features a spacious countertop and wrought iron scrollwork details that add visual appeal. Slender enough for almost any space, this wicker storage unit is sure to add a creative storage solution to any room. Overall: 18" W x 13.25" D x 52.25" H; Top: 17.5" W x 11.75" D; Drawers: 14" W x 11" D x 5" H (small), 14" W x 11" D x 8.5" H (large); Clearance: 5" HThis one-of-a-kind item weighs approximately 33 poundsand can . Only quality materials and manufacturing will do. Product materials include: MDF, veneer, wicker, round pipe. Assembly required. Made in China
feature_bullets: This beautiful wicker storage unit features five drawers and a spacious countertop
Versatile storage tower keeps essentials handy in the kitchen, dining room, or living room
Black with warm caramel finish combines with wrought iron scrollwork for soft country style
Charming furniture piece is made with MDF, veneer, wicker, and round pipe
Space saving rack weighs 33 pounds and measures 18 inches wide x 13.25 inches deep x 52.25 inches high
